page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: In making a portrait of our own block the {Information systems }used involved local inhabitants,parents, governors,teachers and children. Contributors from third and fourth year junior children,aged 9 to 11: Samantha Barker Steven Prodger Claire Bryan Stephen Rugman Claire Carter Suzanne Smart Jennie Carter Stephen Targett Sarah Corrigan John-Paul Toffi Zoe Cruse Sarah Veysey Sandra Fryer Debbie Wardle Debbie Glover Charlotte Washington Sadie Goldstone Nichola Whybrow Karen Keniry Nicola Wilkins Edward Lewis Amanda Willis Richard Mann Marcus Winstone Marc Powell Paul Wootton
